item.title: Performance of Fully Automated Portfolio Mgt. and Algo. Trading System
item.description: Portfolio Performance (Track record from 8 Sep 2020 where I fully automated algorithmic trading system) Overall portfolio (excluding options and crypto pnl) Equity curve based on equity in brokerage (doesn’t factor approximately levered factor of 1.2-1.3 from external places) Risk parity portfolio (10% volatility) Volatility risk premium portfolio Option strategy 1 (equity curve - interim performance monitoring feature) Since Dec 2020 As a proportion of risk capital.
